titleStmt.title: Description of Free Library of Philadelphia, Lewis E 260: Schwabenspiegel
titleStmt.funder: Council on Library and Information Resources

msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains the text of Schwabenspiegel, legal code concerning land ownership and other matters.

support.watermark: Bull's head with an attached star/flower (fols. 1, 56)

supportDesc.foliation: Contemporary foliation in red ink upper center of margin recto

layoutDesc.layout: Frame-ruled in lead in two columns of variable lines ranging from forty-five to fifty-two

decoDesc.decoNote: Two-line initials in red decorated with foliate designs throughout; decorative faces in ascenders and initials; rubrication throughout
